definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
nothing remains the same (idiom); change beyond recognition
lit. not to know the true face of Lushan Mountain/fig. can't see the forest for the trees
pinyin: bu4 shi4 Lu2 shan1 zhen1 mian4 mu4

definition: complete change (idiom); facelift/We're in a wholly new situation.

sentences.english: We don't change things out of personal prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为个人成见而改变事物的本来面目。

sentences.english: Mr Jobs emerges as a controlling and often unsympathetic character.
sentences.chinese: 乔布斯以控制狂兼冷血无情的面目出现。

sentences.english: Just read Leeao's book " The True Face of Chen Shui Bian" you will be enlightened.
sentences.chinese: 不妨读读李敖的《陈水扁真面目》，你将会茅塞顿开。

sentences.english: and you may have even guessed that it's the real face behind Design, LLC.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可能猜到设计有限责任公司背后的真面目。

sentences.english: The emperor of Liang dynasty , Xiao Yan , is famous for revering Buddha in the history of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝萧衍在中国文化史上是以崇佛的面目出现的。

sentences.english: The editor hacked the story to bits.
sentences.chinese: 编辑把那篇小说改得面目全非。

sentences.english: The five boys who came to play video games reshuffled everything.
sentences.chinese: 五个去玩电子游戏的男孩让罗斯家面目一新。

sentences.english: The faces of these idols were distorted and grotesque with violent expressions of anger and hatred.
sentences.chinese: 这些偶像各个面目狰狞，满是仇恨和愤怒。

sentences.english: Each day takes on a new face.
Give yourself permission to be a fool and see things for what they really are.
sentences.chinese: 允许自己变成愚人，看事物的本来面目。

sentences.english: So I figured I would draw Kakashi's face.
sentences.chinese: 所以我认为我应该画出卡卡西的真面目。

sentences.english: Another dish was made entirely of organs, which again had been hacked beyond recognition.
sentences.chinese: 还有一道菜全是内脏，同样砍得面目全非。

sentences.english: All the dead and injured were burned beyond recognition.
sentences.chinese: 所有的死者和伤者都被烧得面目全非。

sentences.english: Smoother showed the face of its ferocious gradually.
sentences.chinese: 浓雾逐渐露出了它狰狞的面目。

sentences.english: Fortune does not change men, it unmasks them.
sentences.chinese: 财富不会改变人，而是揭露人的真面目。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the city itself changes almost beyond recognition.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，这个城市本身也变得面目全非。
